title: Peppered Maple and Thyme Turkey Brine

Ingredients.2: 0.5 cup Better Than Bouillon® Roasted Chicken Base

Directions.1: In the vessel that you will marinate the turkey in, combine all ingredients and mix well with a wire whisk, being sure that the chicken base is completely blended.

Directions.2: Carefully place raw turkey or poultry into this vessel, being sure that the entire bird is covered with the brine.

Directions.3: Cover vessel and place under proper refrigeration for 24 to 48 hours.

Directions.4: When ready to cook the turkey, carefully remove it from the brine and rinse under cold water and pat dry with a paper towel.

Directions.5: Your turkey is now ready to cook, as you normally would do.
